channel.title: Next Generation BH - Flawless Bounty Hunter *Look at Pictures*
channel.description:
[center] [center] [img]http://s7.postimage.org/it2adozez/Untitled_1.gif[/img] [size=24pt]Play Now:[/size] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.png[/img][url=http://www.ng-forums.com/NextgenerationBH.rar]Download Client (Direct)[/url] || [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.png[/img][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?qb0sdnzwqg1z0bz]Download Client - (Mediafire)[/url] || [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.png[/img][url=http://uppit.com/g2dgo0kaz2hf/NextgenerationBH.rar]Download Client - (uppit)[/url] [size=24pt]Client Problems:[/size] If you get a error extracting I'm afraid you will need to redownload. Then you more than likely need this java http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk7-downloads-1880260.html If it is still not working post your error here and someone will help http://www.ng-forums.com/smf/index.php/board,58.0.html [size=24pt]Features:[/size] [i] [b]
-Flawless PvP Combat (Magic, Melee, Range). -Flawless NPC Combat (Perfect npc animations, Perfect Gfx). -Bounty hunter cash reward system (To claim right click the banker and select "Collect" -Bounty Hunter point system (Includes shop) -Old school feel, nice game frame, perfect for hybriding -100% weapon poison system -Anti farming systems -Working clan chat (includes Lootshare) -Flawless bounty hunter (Targets, Requirements, Leave Pens, Pickup Pens, multi system, everything) -Flawless hybrid economy setup (We have plan's and have a great economy setup) -Stunning barrage orbs (With put up a gif image later) -Dragon bolt effects (proper gfx) -Stunning 508 maps with the potential for great minigames such as clan wars. -PK Following (Range/Mage/Melee) All Perfect -8.25GB Dedicated Server -View equipment stats proper interface -Half/Full Tb's -D Spear Fully Working -Avas backpack is fully working with its effect -Full Dueling system -Fully working void armor (Mage/Range/Melee) All has an effect[/b][/i] + Many many more!
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/w7mqrs.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2vtv7nt.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/1GNzq[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/1HMRo[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2jbmpdw.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2vuzjnd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/28u5ok7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/hwiszo.png[/img] ] [/center]

item.title: Next Generation BH - Flawless Bounty Hunter *Look at Pictures*
item.dc:creator: @loved loved
item.description:
@loved wrote:

[center]
[center]

Untitled_1.gif728×90

[size=24pt]Play Now:[/size]
Download Client (Direct) ||
Download Client - (Mediafire) || Download Client - (uppit)

[size=24pt]Client Problems:[/size]
If you get a error extracting I’m afraid you will need to redownload.
Then you more than likely need this java
http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk7-downloads-1880260.html
If it is still not working post your error here and someone will help
http://www.ng-forums.com/smf/index.php/board,58.0.html

[size=24pt]Features:[/size]

-Flawless PvP Combat (Magic, Melee, Range).
-Flawless NPC Combat (Perfect npc animations, Perfect Gfx).
-Bounty hunter cash reward system (To claim right click the banker and select “Collect”
-Bounty Hunter point system (Includes shop)
-Old school feel, nice game frame, perfect for hybriding
-100% weapon poison system
-Anti farming systems
-Working clan chat (includes Lootshare)
-Flawless bounty hunter (Targets, Requirements, Leave Pens, Pickup Pens, multi system, everything)
-Flawless hybrid economy setup (We have plan’s and have a great economy setup)
-Stunning barrage orbs (With put up a gif image later)
-Dragon bolt effects (proper gfx)
-Stunning 508 maps with the potential for great minigames such as clan wars.
-PK Following (Range/Mage/Melee) All Perfect
-8.25GB Dedicated Server
-View equipment stats proper interface
-Half/Full Tb’s
-D Spear Fully Working
-Avas backpack is fully working with its effect
-Full Dueling system
-Fully working void armor (Mage/Range/Melee) All has an effect

  • Many many more!

[/center]
